name: Global Anthro Notes Project
body:
### Welcome to the Biblical Culture Notes Project
[Biblical Culture Notes Google Sheet (SIL-only)](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1qk3G-uDbEQUER4-ojHVxw9AQVH2RYIkL4ILng5graP0/edit#gid=307261277)

Paratext 8.0 Setup:

1. Download and Install [Paratext 8](http://pt8.paratext.org/download/currentversion/) (If you haven't already done so.)

Paratext 8 Biblical Culture Notes Resource (BCNen):

1. [View in HTML (English)](notes/en/) | Download latest [English BCNen.p8z](https://drive.google.com/open?id=0BxKtjmBey1gkbEx4QUp5ckdJNnM).
 
Biblical Culture Notes Installation:

1. Download Latest BCNen.p8z (select above, and click on "Download" icon) and Save or Copy to your "My Paratext 8 Projects\_Resources\" folder.
2. In Paratext, File > Open File/Resource... to a scripture project or resource
3. View > Show Consultant Notes > BCNen - Biblical Culture Notes (en). 
4. Navigate to Ruth 1:1 in the scripture project or resource
 
[LCO to OCM](lco-ocm/)

[ANQR wiki](https://www.wiki.insitehome.org/display/IntlAnthro/ANQR+Resource+Library)

### Authors and Contributors
Eric Pyle (@ericpyle)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
